## PriceAdjustment interface

PriceAdjustment is deprecated. Taxes will be included or excluded in the price. The PricedAdjustment object defines the amount of money to apply as an adjustment, the type of adjustment to apply, and whether the item is included or excluded from the adjustment.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PriceAdjustment 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [amount?](./magento-api.priceadjustment.amount.md) | Maybe&lt;[Money](./magento-api.money.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The amount of the price adjustment and its currency code. |
|  [code?](./magento-api.priceadjustment.code.md) | Maybe&lt;[PriceAdjustmentCodesEnum](./magento-api.priceadjustmentcodesenum.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether the adjustment involves tax, weee, or weee\_tax. |
|  [description?](./magento-api.priceadjustment.description.md) | Maybe&lt;[PriceAdjustmentDescriptionEnum](./magento-api.priceadjustmentdescriptionenum.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether the entity described by the code attribute is included or excluded from the adjustment. |
